# Neura Studio

> Neura Studio is a free AI-powered portfolio builder that helps developers, designers, and creatives create stunning portfolio websites in minutes.

## What is Neura Studio?

Neura Studio (https://neura-studio.vercel.app) is a web application that generates professional portfolio websites using AI. Users can:

1. Upload their resume (PDF or text)
2. AI automatically extracts and fills in their information
3. Choose from 50+ premium, unique portfolio templates
4. Preview their portfolio live
5. Export the complete portfolio as a Next.js project

## Key Features

- **AI Auto-Fill**: Upload your resume and AI extracts your name, skills, experience, projects, and education automatically
- **50+ Premium Templates**: Unique designs including cyberpunk, minimalist, 3D interactive, glassmorphism, retro, neon, dark academia, vaporwave, and more
- **Live Preview**: See your portfolio in real-time as you make changes
- **Export to Next.js**: Get a complete, production-ready Next.js codebase
- **Responsive Design**: All portfolios are mobile-friendly
- **No Coding Required**: Create professional portfolios without any coding knowledge

## Template Categories

### Developer Portfolios
- Cyberpunk Neon
- Terminal CLI
- Matrix Rain
- 3D Interactive
- Circuit Board

### Designer Portfolios  
- Apple Minimal
- Glassmorphism
- Neo Brutalism
- Magazine Editorial
- Japanese Zen

### Creative Portfolios
- Vaporwave
- Retro Comic
- Dark Academia
- Watercolor Splash
- Polaroid Memories

## Pricing

Neura Studio is **free to use**. All features including AI auto-fill, all 50+ templates, live preview, and Next.js export are available at no cost.

## How to Use

1. Visit https://neura-studio.vercel.app
2. Click "Get Started" or "Browse Templates"
3. Sign up for a free account
4. Upload your resume or manually enter your information
5. Choose a template that fits your style
6. Customize colors, fonts, and content
7. Export your portfolio as a Next.js project
8. Deploy to Vercel, Netlify, or any hosting provider

## Technology

Neura Studio is built with:
- Next.js 14
- React
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion
- Three.js (for 3D templates)

## Links

- Website: https://neura-studio.vercel.app
- Templates: https://neura-studio.vercel.app/templates
- Sign Up: https://neura-studio.vercel.app/signup

## Contact

For support or inquiries, visit: https://neura-studio.vercel.app

Neura Studio - Create stunning portfolios in minutes with AI.
